mapper.select: select * from matchboard order by mb_regdate asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO matchboard(mb_num, mb_subject, mb_writer, mb_content, mb_regdate, mb_status, mb_city, mb_state,mb_location) VALUES(seq_fb_num.NEXTVAL,#{mb_subject},#{mb_writer},#{mb_content},SYSDATE,0,#{mb_city},#{mb_state},#{mb_location})
mapper.update: UPDATE matchboard SET mb_status = 1 WHERE mb_num = #{mb_num}
